mapper.update: update YHQXB set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERROLE = #{userrole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONENAME = #{phonename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select ID, NAME, USERNAME, PASSWORD, USERROLE, PHONENAME from YHQXB
